Tag.Title: Exif IFD
Tag.Description: Private property used by the Imaging API.\nNot for public use.\nThe Imaging API uses this property to locate Exif-specific information.

Tag.Title: GPS IFD
Tag.Description: Offset to a block of GPS property items.\nProperty items whose tags have the prefix PropertyTagGps are stored in the GPS block. The GPS property items are defined in the EXIF specification.\nThe Imaging API uses this property to locate GPS information, but it does not expose this property for public use.

Tag.Title: New Subfile Type
Tag.Description: Type of data in a subfile.

Tag.Title: Subfile Type
Tag.Description: Type of data in a subfile.

Tag.Title: Image Width
Tag.Description: Number of pixels per row.

Tag.Title: Image Height
Tag.Description: Number of pixel rows.

Tag.Title: Bits Per Sample
Tag.Description: Number of bits per color component. See also PropertyTagSamplesPerPixel.

Tag.Title: Compression
Tag.Description: Compression scheme used for the image data.

Tag.Title: Photometric Interp
Tag.Description: How pixel data will be interpreted.

Tag.Title: Thresh Holding
Tag.Description: Technique used to convert from gray pixels to black and white pixels.

Tag.Title: Cell Width
Tag.Description: Width of the dithering or halftoning matrix.

Tag.Title: Cell Height
Tag.Description: Height of the dithering or halftoning matrix.

Tag.Title: Fill Order
Tag.Description: Logical order of bits in a byte.

Tag.Title: Document Name
Tag.Description: Specifies the name of the document from which the image was scanned.

Tag.Title: Image Description
Tag.Description: Specifies the title of the image.

Tag.Title: Equip Make
Tag.Description: Specifies the manufacturer of the equipment used to record the image.

Tag.Title: Equip Model
Tag.Description: specifies the model name or model number of the equipment used to record the image.

Tag.Title: Strip Offsets
Tag.Description: For each strip, the byte offset of that strip. See also PropertyTagRowsPerStrip> and PropertyTagStripBytesCount.

Tag.Title: Orientation
Tag.Description: Image orientation viewed in terms of rows and columns.

Values.Value: The 0th row is at the top of the visual image, and the 0th column is the visual left side.
The 0th row is at the visual top of the image, and the 0th column is the visual right side.
The 0th row is at the visual bottom of the image, and the 0th column is the visual right side.
The 0th row is at the visual bottom of the image, and the 0th column is the visual right side.
The 0th row is the visual left side of the image, and the 0th column is the visual top.
The 0th row is the visual right side of the image, and the 0th column is the visual top.
The 0th row is the visual right side of the image, and the 0th column is the visual bottom.
The 0th row is the visual left side of the image, and the 0th column is the visual bottom.

Tag.Title: Samples Per Pixel
Tag.Description: Number of color components per pixel.

Tag.Title: Rows Per Strip
Tag.Description: Number of rows per strip. See also PropertyTagStripBytesCount and PropertyTagStripOffsets.

Tag.Title: Strip Bytes Count
Tag.Description: For each strip, the total number of bytes in that strip.

Tag.Title: MinSample Value
Tag.Description: For each color component, the minimum value assigned to that component. See also PropertyTagSamplesPerPixel.

Tag.Title: MaxSample Value
Tag.Description: For each color component, the maximum value assigned to that component. See also PropertyTagSamplesPerPixel.

Tag.Title: X Resolution
Tag.Description: Image resolution in width direction. Number of pixels per unit in the image width (x) direction. The unit is specified by PropertyTagResolutionUnit

Tag.Title: Y Resolution
Tag.Description: Image resolution in height direction. Number of pixels per unit in the image height (y) direction. The unit is specified by PropertyTagResolutionUnit.

Tag.Title: Planar Config
Tag.Description: Image data arrangement. Whether pixel components are recorded in chunky or planar format.

Tag.Title: Page Name
Tag.Description: Specifies the name of the page from which the image was scanned.

Tag.Title: X Position
Tag.Description: Offset from the left side of the page to the left side of the image. The unit of measure is specified by PropertyTagResolutionUnit.

Tag.Title: Y Position
Tag.Description: Offset from the top of the page to the top of the image. The unit of measure is specified by PropertyTagResolutionUnit.

Tag.Title: Free Offset
Tag.Description: For each string of contiguous unused bytes, the byte offset of that string.

Tag.Title: Free Byte Counts
Tag.Description: For each string of contiguous unused bytes, the number of bytes in that string.

Tag.Title: Gray Response Unit
Tag.Description: Precision of the number specified by PropertyTagGrayResponseCurve.\n1 specifies tenths, 2 specifies hundredths, 3 specifies thousandths, and so on.

Tag.Title: Gray Response Curve
Tag.Description: For each possible pixel value in a grayscale image, the optical density of that pixel value.

Tag.Title: T4 Option
Tag.Description: Set of flags that relate to T4 encoding.

Tag.Title: T6 Option
Tag.Description: Set of flags that relate to T6 encoding.

Tag.Title: Resolution Unit
Tag.Description: Unit of X and Y resolution.\nUnit of measure for the horizontal resolution and the vertical resolution.\nA setting of 2 indicates inches and a setting of 3 indicates centimeters.

Tag.Title: Page Number
Tag.Description: Page number of the page from which the image was scanned.

Tag.Title: Transfer Function
Tag.Description: Table of values that specify color transfer functions. Tables that specify transfer functions for the image.

Tag.Title: Software Used
Tag.Description: Specifies the name and version of the software or firmware of the device used to generate the image.

Tag.Title: DateTime
Tag.Description: Date and time the image was created.

Tag.Title: Artist
Tag.Description: Specifies the name of the person who created the image.

Tag.Title: Host Computer
Tag.Description: specifies the computer and/or operating system used to create the image.

Tag.Title: Predictor
Tag.Description: Type of prediction scheme that was applied to the image data before the encoding scheme was applied.

Tag.Title: White Point
Tag.Description: Chromaticity of the white point of the image.

Tag.Title: Primary Chromaticities
Tag.Description: For each of the three primary colors in the image, the chromaticity of that color.

Tag.Title: Color Map
Tag.Description: Color palette (lookup table) for a palette-indexed image.

Tag.Title: Halftone Hints
Tag.Description: Information used by the halftone function

Tag.Title: Tile Width
Tag.Description: Number of pixel columns in each tile.

Tag.Title: Tile Length
Tag.Description: Number of pixel rows in each tile.

Tag.Title: Tile Offset
Tag.Description: For each tile, the byte offset of that tile.

Tag.Title: Tile Byte Counts
Tag.Description: For each tile, the number of bytes in that tile.

Tag.Title: Ink Set
Tag.Description: Set of inks used in a separated image

Tag.Title: Ink Names
Tag.Description: Sequence of concatenated, null-terminated, character strings that specify the names of the inks used in a separated image.

Tag.Title: Number Of Inks
Tag.Description: Number of inks.

Tag.Title: Dot Range
Tag.Description: Color component values that correspond to a 0 percent dot and a 100 percent dot

Tag.Title: Target Printer
Tag.Description: Describes the intended printing environment.

Tag.Title: Extra Samples
Tag.Description: Number of extra color components. For example, one extra component might hold an alpha value.

Tag.Title: Sample Format
Tag.Description: For each color component, the numerical format (unsigned, signed, floating point) of that component. See also PropertyTagSamplesPerPixel.

Tag.Title: SMin Sample Value
Tag.Description: For each color component, the minimum value of that component. See also PropertyTagSamplesPerPixel.

Tag.Title: SMax Sample Value
Tag.Description: For each color component, the maximum value of that component. See also PropertyTagSamplesPerPixel.

Tag.Title: Transfer Range
Tag.Description: Table of values that extends the range of the transfer function.

Tag.Title: JPEG Proc
Tag.Description: JPEG compression process.

Tag.Title: JPEG Inter Format
Tag.Description: Offset to the start of a JPEG bitstream.

Tag.Title: JPEG Inter Length
Tag.Description: Length, in bytes, of the JPEG bitstream.

Tag.Title: JPEG Restart Interval
Tag.Description: Length of the restart interval.

Tag.Title: JPEG Lossless Predictors
Tag.Description: For each color component, a lossless predictor-selection value for that component. See also PropertyTagSamplesPerPixel.

Tag.Title: JPEG Point Transforms
Tag.Description: For each color component, a point transformation value for that component. See also PropertyTagSamplesPerPixel.

Tag.Title: JPEG Q Tables
Tag.Description: For each color component, the offset to the quantization table for that component. See also PropertyTagSamplesPerPixel.

Tag.Title: JPEG DC Tables
Tag.Description: For each color component, the offset to the DC Huffman table (or lossless Huffman table) for that component. See also PropertyTagSamplesPerPixel.

Tag.Title: JPEG AC Tables
Tag.Description: For each color component, the offset to the AC Huffman table for that component. See also PropertyTagSamplesPerPixel

Tag.Title: YCbCr Coefficients
Tag.Description: Coefficients for transformation from RGB to YCbCr image data.

Tag.Title: YCbCr Subsampling
Tag.Description: Sampling ratio of chrominance components in relation to the luminance component.

Tag.Title: YCbCr Positioning
Tag.Description: Position of chrominance components in relation to the luminance component.

Tag.Title: REF Black White
Tag.Description: Reference black point value and reference white point value.

Tag.Title: ICC Profile
Tag.Description: This TAG is defined by ICC embedded ICC in TIFF. International Color Consortium (ICC) profile embedded in the image.

Tag.Title: Gamma
Tag.Description: Gamma value attached to the image.\The gamma value is stored as a rational number (pair of long) with a numerator of 100000. For example, a gamma value of 2.2 is stored as the pair (100000, 45455).

Tag.Title: ICC Profile Descriptor
Tag.Description: Identifies an ICC profile.

Tag.Title: SRGB Rendering Intent
Tag.Description: How the image should be displayed as defined by the International Color Consortium (ICC).\nIf an Image object is constructed with the useEmbeddedColorManagement parameter set to TRUE, then the Imaging API renders the image according to the specified rendering intent.\nThe following table shows the possible settings for this property.

Values.Value: Perceptual intent, which is suitable for photographs, gives good adaptation to the display device gamut at the expense of colorimetric accuracy.
Relative colorimetric intent is suitable for images (for example, logos) that require color appearance matching that is relative to the display device white point.
Saturation intent, which is suitable for charts and graphs, preserves saturation at the expense of hue and lightness.
Absolute colorimetric intent is suitable for proofs (previews of images destined for a different display device) that require preservation of absolute colorimetry.

Tag.Title: Image Title
Tag.Description: Specifies the title of the image.

Tag.Title: Copyright
Tag.Description: Contains copyright information

Category.Title: Extra
Category.Description: Like Adobe Image Information tags etc.

Tag.Title: Resolution X Unit
Tag.Description: Units in which to display horizontal resolution.\nA setting of 1 indicates pixels per inch and a setting of 2 indicates pixels per centimeter.

Tag.Title: Resolution Y Unit
Tag.Description: Units in which to display vertical resolution.\nA setting of 1 indicates pixels per inch and a setting of 2 indicates pixels per centimeter.

Tag.Title: Resolution X Length Unit
Tag.Description: Units in which to display the image width.

Tag.Title: Resolution Y Length Unit
Tag.Description: Units in which to display the image height.

Tag.Title: Print Flags
Tag.Description: Sequence of one-byte Boolean values that specify printing options.

Tag.Title: Print Flags Version
Tag.Description: Print flags version.

Tag.Title: Print Flags Crop
Tag.Description: Print flags center crop marks.

Tag.Title: Print Flags Bleed Width
Tag.Description: Print flags bleed width.

Tag.Title: Print Flags Bleed Width Scale
Tag.Description: Print flags bleed width scale.

Tag.Title: Halftone LPI
Tag.Description: Ink's screen frequency, in lines per inch.

Tag.Title: Halftone LPI Unit
Tag.Description: Units for the screen frequency.\nA setting of 1 indicates lines per inch and a setting of 2 indicates lines per centimeter

Tag.Title: Halftone Degree
Tag.Description: Angle for screen.

Tag.Title: Halftone Shape
Tag.Description: Shape of the halftone dots.

Tag.Title: Halftone Misc
Tag.Description: Miscellaneous halftone information.

Tag.Title: Halftone Screen
Tag.Description: Boolean value that specifies whether to use the printer's default screens.\nA setting of 1 indicates that the printer's default screens should be used and a setting of 2 indicates otherwise.

Tag.Title: JPEG Quality
Tag.Description: Private property used by the Adobe Photoshop format.\nNot for public use.

Tag.Title: Grid Size
Tag.Description: Block of information about grids and guides.

Tag.Title: Thumbnail Format
Tag.Description: Format of the thumbnail image.\nA setting of 1 indicates raw RGB and a setting of 2 indicates JPEG.

Tag.Title: Thumbnail Width
Tag.Description: Width, in pixels, of the thumbnail image.

Tag.Title: Thumbnail Height
Tag.Description: Height, in pixels, of the thumbnail image.

Tag.Title: Thumbnail Color Depth
Tag.Description: Bits per pixel (BPP) for the thumbnail image.

Tag.Title: Thumbnail Planes
Tag.Description: Number of color planes for the thumbnail image.

Tag.Title: Thumbnail RawBytes
Tag.Description: Byte offset between rows of pixel data.

Tag.Title: Thumbnail Size
Tag.Description: Total size, in bytes, of the thumbnail image.

Tag.Title: Thumbnail Compressed Size
Tag.Description: Compressed size, in bytes, of the thumbnail image.

Tag.Title: Color Transfer Function
Tag.Description: Table of values that specify color transfer functions.

Tag.Title: Thumbnail Data
Tag.Description: RAW thumbnail bits in JPEG format or RGB format depends on 'Thumbnail Format'

Tag.Title: Image Width
Tag.Description: Thumbnail width. Number of pixels per row in the thumbnail image

Tag.Title: Image Height
Tag.Description: Thumbnail height. Number of pixel rows in the thumbnail image.

Tag.Title: Bits Per Sample
Tag.Description: Number of bits per component. Number of bits per color component in the thumbnail image. See also PropertyTagThumbnailSamplesPerPixel.

Tag.Title: Compression
Tag.Description: Compression scheme used for thumbnail image data.

Tag.Title: Photometric Interp
Tag.Description: Pixel composition. How thumbnail pixel data will be interpreted.

Tag.Title: Image Description
Tag.Description: Image Title. Specifies the title of the image.

Tag.Title: Equip Make
Tag.Description: Manufacturer of Image Input equipment. Specifies the manufacturer of the equipment used to record the thumbnail image

Tag.Title: Equip Model
Tag.Description: Model of Image input equipment. specifies the model name or model number of the equipment used to record the thumbnail image.

Tag.Title: Strip Offsets
Tag.Description: Image data location. For each strip in the thumbnail image, the byte offset of that strip. See also PropertyTagThumbnailRowsPerStrip and PropertyTagThumbnailStripBytesCount.

Tag.Title: Orientation
Tag.Description: Orientation of image. Thumbnail image orientation in terms of rows and columns. See also PropertyTagOrientation.

Tag.Title: Samples Per Pixel
Tag.Description: Number of components. Number of color components per pixel in the thumbnail image.

Tag.Title: Rows Per Strip
Tag.Description: Number of rows per strip. Number of rows per strip in the thumbnail image. See also PropertyTagThumbnailStripBytesCount and PropertyTagThumbnailStripOffsets.

Tag.Title: Strip Bytes Count
Tag.Description: Bytes per compressed strip. For each thumbnail image strip, the total number of bytes in that strip.

Tag.Title: Resolution X
Tag.Description: Resolution in width direction. Thumbnail resolution in the width direction. The resolution unit is given in PropertyTagThumbnailResolutionUnit

Tag.Title: Resolution Y
Tag.Description: Resolution in height direction. Thumbnail resolution in the height direction. The resolution unit is given in PropertyTagThumbnailResolutionUnit

Tag.Title: Planar Config
Tag.Description: Image data arrangement. Whether pixel components in the thumbnail image are recorded in chunky or planar format. See also PropertyTagPlanarConfig.

Tag.Title: Resolution Unit
Tag.Description: Unit of X and Y Resolution. Unit of measure for the horizontal resolution and the vertical resolution of the thumbnail image. See also PropertyTagResolutionUnit.

Tag.Title: Transfer Function
Tag.Description: Transfer function. Tables that specify transfer functions for the thumbnail image. See also PropertyTagTransferFunction.

Tag.Title: Software Used
Tag.Description: Software used. Specifies the name and version of the software or firmware of the device used to generate the thumbnail image.

Tag.Title: Date Time
Tag.Description: File change date and time. Date and time the thumbnail image was created. See also PropertyTagDateTime.

Tag.Title: Artist
Tag.Description: Person who created the image. Specifies the name of the person who created the thumbnail image.

Tag.Title: White Point
Tag.Description: White point chromaticity. Chromaticity of the white point of the thumbnail image. See also PropertyTagWhitePoint.

Tag.Title: Primary Chromaticities
Tag.Description: Chromaticities of primaries. For each of the three primary colors in the thumbnail image, the chromaticity of that color. See also PropertyTagPrimaryChromaticities.

Tag.Title: YCbCr Coefficients
Tag.Description: Color space transformation coefficients. Coefficients for transformation from RGB to YCbCr data for the thumbnail image. See also PropertyTagYCbCrCoefficients.

Tag.Title: YCbCr Subsampling
Tag.Description: Subsampling ratio of Y to C. Sampling ratio of chrominance components in relation to the luminance component for the thumbnail image. See also PropertyTagYCbCrSubsampling.

Tag.Title: YCbCr Positioning
Tag.Description: Y and C position. Position of chrominance components in relation to the luminance component for the thumbnail image. See also PropertyTagYCbCrPositioning.

Tag.Title: Ref Black White
Tag.Description: Pair of black and white reference values. Reference black point value and reference white point value for the thumbnail image. See also PropertyTagREFBlackWhite.

Tag.Title: CopyRight
Tag.Description: CopyRight holder. Contains copyright information for the thumbnail image.

Tag.Title: Luminance Table
Tag.Description: Luminance table. The luminance table and the chrominance table are used to control JPEG quality.\nA valid luminance or chrominance table has 64 entries of type PropertyTagTypeShort.\nIf an image has a luminance table or a chrominance table, it must have both tables.

Tag.Title: Chrominance Table
Tag.Description:
Chrominance table.
The luminance table and the chrominance table are used to control JPEG quality.
A valid luminance or chrominance table has 64 entries of type PropertyTagTypeShort.
If an image has a luminance table or a chrominance table, it must have both tables.

Tag.Title: Frame Delay
Tag.Description: Time delay, in hundredths of a second, between two frames in an animated GIF image.

Tag.Title: Loop Count
Tag.Description: For an animated GIF image, the number of times to display the animation.\nA value of 0 specifies that the animation should be displayed infinitely.

Tag.Title: Global Palette
Tag.Description: Color palette for an indexed bitmap in a GIF image.

Tag.Title: Index Background
Tag.Description: Index of the background color in the palette of a GIF image.

Tag.Title: Index Transparent
Tag.Description: Index of the transparent color in the palette of a GIF image.

Tag.Title: Pixel Unit
Tag.Description: Unit specifier pixel/unit.\nUnit for PropertyTagPixelPerUnitX and PropertyTagPixelPerUnitY.\nA setting of 0 indicates that property is unknown.

Tag.Title: Pixel Per Unit X
Tag.Description: Pixels per unit in the x direction

Tag.Title: Pixel Per Unit Y
Tag.Description: Pixels per unit in the Y direction

Tag.Title: Palette Histogram
Tag.Description: Palette histogram

Tag.Title: Exposure Time
Tag.Description: Exposure time, measured in seconds.

Tag.Title: FNumber
Tag.Description: The F number at the time the image was taken.

Tag.Title: Exposure Prog
Tag.Description: Class of the program used by the camera to set exposure when the picture is taken.\nThe default setting for the this property is 0

Values.Value: Creative program (biased toward depth of field)
Action program (biased toward fast shutter speed)
Portrait mode (for close-up photos with the background out of focus)
Landscape mode (for landscape photos with the background in focus)

Tag.Title: Spectral Sense
Tag.Description: Null-terminated character string that specifies the spectral sensitivity of each channel of the camera used.\nThe string is compatible with the standard developed by the ASTM Technical Committee.

Tag.Title: ISO Speed
Tag.Description: ISO speed and ISO latitude of the camera or input device as specified in ISO 12232

Tag.Title: OECF
Tag.Description: Optoelectronic conversion function (OECF) specified in ISO 14524.\nThe OECF is the relationship between the camera optical input and the image values.

Tag.Title: Ver
Tag.Description:
Version of the EXIF standard supported.
Nonexistence of this field is taken to mean nonconformance to the standard.
Conformance to the standard is indicated by recording 0210 as a 4-byte ASCII string.
Because the type is PropertyTagTypeUndefined, there is no NULL terminator.
The default setting for this property is 0210.

Tag.Title: DT Orig
Tag.Description:
Date and time of original.
Date and time when the original image data was generated.
For a digital camera, the date and time when the picture was taken.
The format is YYYY:MM:DD HH:MM:SS with time shown in 24-hour format and the date and time separated by one blank character (0x2000).
The character string length is 20 bytes including the NULL terminator.
When the field is EMPTY, it is treated as unknown.

Tag.Title: DT Digitized
Tag.Description:
Date and time of digital data generation.
The format is YYYY:MM:DD HH:MM:SS, with time shown in 24-hour format and the date and time separated by one blank character (0x2000).
The character string length is 20 bytes including the NULL terminator.
When the field is EMPTY, it is treated as unknown.

Tag.Title: Comp Config
Tag.Description: Information specific to compressed data. The channels of each component are arranged in order from the first component to the fourth.\nFor uncompressed data, the data arrangement is given in the PropertyTagPhotometricInterp tag. However, because PropertyTagPhotometricInterp can only express the order of Y, Cb, and Cr, this property is provided for cases when compressed data uses components other than Y, Cb, and Cr and to support other sequences.\nThe default setting for the PropertyTagExifCompConfig value is '4 5 6 0' for uncompressed RGB data an '1 2 3 0' for all other cases.

Values.Value: The color component does not exist.

Tag.Title: Comp BPP
Tag.Description: Information specific to compressed data. The compression mode used for a compressed image is indicated in unit BPP.

Tag.Title: Shutter Speed
Tag.Description: Shutter speed.\nThe unit is the Additive System of Photographic Exposure (APEX) value.

Tag.Title: Aperture
Tag.Description: Lens aperture.\nThe unit is the APEX value

Tag.Title: Brightness
Tag.Description: Brightness value.\nThe unit is the APEX value.\nOrdinarily it is given in the range of -99.99 to 99.99

Tag.Title: Exposure Bias
Tag.Description: Exposure bias.\nThe unit is the APEX value.\nOrdinarily it is given in the range -99.99 to 99.99.

Tag.Title: MaxAperture
Tag.Description: Smallest F number of the lens.\nThe unit is the APEX value.\nOrdinarily it is given in the range of 00.00 to 99.99, but it is not limited to this range.

Tag.Title: Subject Dist
Tag.Description: Distance to the subject, measured in meters.

Tag.Title: Metering Mode
Tag.Description: Metering mode.\nThe default setting for this property is 0.

Tag.Title: Light Source
Tag.Description: Type of light source. The default setting for this property is 0.

Tag.Title: Flash
Tag.Description:
Flash status.
This property is recorded when an image is taken using a strobe light (flash).
Bit 0 indicates the flash firing status, and bits 1 and 2 indicate the flash return status.
The following table shows the possible values for bit 0.

Tag.Title: Focal Length
Tag.Description: Actual focal length, in millimeters, of the lens.\nConversion is not made to the focal length of a 35 millimeter film camera.

Tag.Title: Subject Area
Tag.Description: exif 2.2 Subject Area

Tag.Title: Maker Note
Tag.Description: Note tag. A property used by manufacturers of EXIF writers to record information. The contents are up to the manufacturer.

Tag.Title: User Comment
Tag.Description: Comment tag. A property used by EXIF users to write keywords or comments about the image besides those in PropertyTagImageDescription and without the character-code limitations of the PropertyTagImageDescription tag.\nThe character code used in the PropertyTagExifUserComment property is identified based on an ID code in a fixed 8-byte area at the start of the property data area.\nThe unused portion of the area is padded with NULL (0). ID codes are assigned by means of registration.\Because the type is not ASCII, it is not necessary to use a NULL terminator.

Tag.Title: DT Subsec
Tag.Description: Date and Time subseconds.\nSpecifies a fraction of a second for the PropertyTagDateTime tag.

Tag.Title: DT Orig SS
Tag.Description: Date and Time original subseconds.\nSpecifies a fraction of a second for the PropertyTagExifDTOrig tag.

Tag.Title: DT Dig SS
Tag.Description: Date and Time digitized subseconds.\nSpecifies a fraction of a second for the PropertyTagExifDTDigitized tag.

Tag.Title: FPX Ver
Tag.Description:
FlashPix format version supported by an FPXR file.
If the FPXR function supports FlashPix format version 1.0, this is indicated similarly to PropertyTagExifVer by recording 0100 as a 4-byte ASCII string.
Because the type is PropertyTagTypeUndefined, there is no NULL terminator.
The default setting for this property is 0100, all other values are reserved.

Tag.Title: Color Space
Tag.Description:
Color space specifier.
Normally sRGB (=1) is used to define the color space based on the PC monitor conditions and environment.
If a color space other than sRGB is used, Uncalibrated (=0xFFFF) is set.
Image data recorded as Uncalibrated can be treated as sRGB when it is converted to FlashPix.

Tag.Title: Pix X Dim
Tag.Description: Information specific to compressed data.\nWhen a compressed file is recorded, the valid width of the meaningful image must be recorded in this tag, whether or not there is padding data or a restart marker.\nThis property should not exist in an uncompressed file

Tag.Title: Pix Y Dim
Tag.Description:
Information specific to compressed data.
When a compressed file is recorded, the valid height of the meaningful image must be recorded in this property's setting whether or not there is padding data or a restart marker.
This property should not exist in an uncompressed file.
Because data padding is unnecessary in the vertical direction, the number of lines recorded in this valid image height property will be the same as that recorded in the SOF.

Tag.Title: Related Wav
Tag.Description:
related sound file
The name of an audio file related to the image data.
The only relational information recorded is the EXIF audio file name and extension (an ASCII string that consists of 8 characters plus a period (.), plus 3 characters).
The path is not recorded.
When you use this tag, audio files must be recorded in conformance with the EXIF audio format.
Writers can also store audio data within APP2 as FlashPix extension stream data.

Tag.Title: Interop
Tag.Description: Offset to a block of property items that contain interoperability information.

Tag.Title: Flash Energy
Tag.Description: Strobe energy, in Beam Candle Power Seconds (BCPS), at the time the image was captured

Tag.Title: Spatial FR
Tag.Description: Spatial Frequency Response\nCamera or input device spatial frequency table and SFR values in the image width, image height, and diagonal direction, as specified in ISO 12233.

Tag.Title: Focal X Res
Tag.Description: Focal Plane X Resolution\nNumber of pixels in the image width (x) direction per unit on the camera focal plane.\nThe unit is specified in PropertyTagExifFocalResUnit.

Tag.Title: Focal Y Res
Tag.Description: Focal Plane Y Resolution\nNumber of pixels in the image height (y) direction per unit on the camera focal plane.\nThe unit is specified in PropertyTagExifFocalResUnit.

Tag.Title: Focal Res Unit
Tag.Description: Focal Plane Resolution Unit\nUnit of measure for PropertyTagExifFocalXRes and PropertyTagExifFocalYRes.\nA setting of 2 indicates inches and a setting of 3 indicates centimeters.

Tag.Title: Subject Loc
Tag.Description: Location of the main subject in the scene.\nThe value of this property represents the pixel at the center of the main subject relative to the left edge.\nThe first value indicates the column number, and the second value indicates the row number.

Tag.Title: Exposure Index
Tag.Description: Exposure index selected on the camera or input device at the time the image was captured.

Tag.Title: Sensing Method
Tag.Description: Image sensor type on the camera or input device.

Tag.Title: File Source
Tag.Description: The image source.\nIf a digital camera recorded the image, the setting for this property is 3.

Tag.Title: Scene Type
Tag.Description: The type of scene.\nIf a digital camera recorded the image, the value of this property must be set to 1, indicating that the image was directly photographed.

Tag.Title: Cfa Pattern
Tag.Description: The color filter array (CFA) geometric pattern of the image sensor when a one-chip color area sensor is used. It does not apply to all sensing methods

Tag.Title: Ver
Tag.Description: Version of the Global Positioning Systems (GPS) IFD, given as 2.0.0.0.\nThis property is mandatory when the PropertyTagGpsIFD property is present.\nWhen the version is 2.0.0.0, the property value is 0x02000000.

Tag.Title: Latitude Ref
Tag.Description: Specifies whether the latitude is north or south. N specifies north latitude, and S specifies south latitude.

Tag.Title: Latitude
Tag.Description: Latitude. Latitude is expressed as three rational values giving the degrees, minutes, and seconds respectively.\nWhen degrees, minutes, and seconds are expressed, the format is dd/1, mm/1, ss/1.\nWhen degrees and minutes are used and, for example, fractions of minutes are given up to two decimal places, the format is dd/1, mmmm/100, 0/1.

Tag.Title: Longitude Ref
Tag.Description: Specifies whether the longitude is east or west longitude.\nE specifies east longitude, and W specifies west longitude.

Tag.Title: Longitude
Tag.Description: Longitude. Longitude is expressed as three rational values giving the degrees, minutes, and seconds respectively.\nWhen degrees, minutes and seconds are expressed, the format is ddd/1, mm/1, ss/1.\nWhen degrees and minutes are used and, for example, fractions of minutes are given up to two decimal places, the format is ddd/1, mmmm/100, 0/1.

Tag.Title: Altitude Ref
Tag.Description: Reference altitude, in meters.

Tag.Title: Altitude
Tag.Description: Altitude, in meters, based on the reference altitude specified by PropertyTagGpsAltitudeRef.

Tag.Title: Gps Time
Tag.Description: Time as coordinated universal time (UTC).\nThe value is expressed as three rational numbers that give the hour, minute, and second.

Tag.Title: Gps Satellites
Tag.Description: Specifies the GPS satellites used for measurements.\nThis property can be used to specify the ID number, angle of elevation, azimuth, SNR, and other information about each satellite. The format is not specified.\nIf the GPS receiver is incapable of taking measurements, the value of the property must be set to NULL.

Tag.Title: Gps Status
Tag.Description: Specifies the status of the GPS receiver when the image is recorded.\nA means measurement is in progress, and V means the measurement is Interoperability.

Tag.Title: Gps Measure Mode
Tag.Description: Specifies the GPS measurement mode.\n2 specifies 2-D measurement, and 3 specifies 3-D measurement.

Tag.Title: Gps Dop
Tag.Description: Measurement precision\nGPS DOP (data degree of precision).\nAn HDOP value is written during 2-D measurement, and a PDOP value is written during 3-D measurement.

Tag.Title: Speed Ref
Tag.Description: Specifies the unit used to express the GPS receiver speed of movement.\nK, M, and N represent kilometers per hour, miles per hour, and knots respectively

Tag.Title: Speed
Tag.Description: Speed of the GPS receiver movement

Tag.Title: Track Ref
Tag.Description: Specifies the reference for giving the direction of GPS receiver movement.\nT specifies true direction, and M specifies magnetic direction.

Tag.Title: Track
Tag.Description: Direction of GPS receiver movement.\nThe range of values is from 0.00 to 359.99.

Tag.Title: Img Dir Ref
Tag.Description: Specifies the reference for the direction of the image when it is captured.\nT specifies true direction, and M specifies magnetic direction.

Tag.Title: Img Dir
Tag.Description: Direction of the image when it was captured.\nThe range of values is from 0.00 to 359.99.

Tag.Title: Map Datum
Tag.Description: Specifies geodetic survey data used by the GPS receiver.\nIf the survey data is restricted to Japan, the value of this property is TOKYO or WGS-84.

Tag.Title: Dest Lat Ref
Tag.Description: Specifies whether the latitude of the destination point is north or south latitude.\nN specifies north latitude, and S specifies south latitude.

Tag.Title: Dest Lat
Tag.Description: Latitude of the destination point. The latitude is expressed as three rational values giving the degrees, minutes, and seconds respectively.\nWhen degrees, minutes, and seconds are expressed, the format is dd/1, mm/1, ss/1.\nWhen degrees and minutes are used and, for example, fractions of minutes are given up to two decimal places, the format is dd/1, mmmm/100, 0/1.

Tag.Title: Dest Long Ref
Tag.Description: Specifies whether the longitude of the destination point is east or west longitude.\nE specifies east longitude, and W specifies west longitude.

Tag.Title: Dest Long
Tag.Description: Longitude of the destination point. The longitude is expressed as three rational values giving the degrees, minutes, and seconds respectively.\nWhen degrees, minutes, and seconds are expressed, the format is ddd/1, mm/1, ss/1.\nWhen degrees and minutes are used and, for example, fractions of minutes are given up to two decimal places, the format is ddd/1, mmmm/100, 0/1.

Tag.Title: Dest Bear Ref
Tag.Description: Specifies the reference used for giving the bearing to the destination point. \nT specifies true direction, and M specifies magnetic direction.

Tag.Title: Dest Bear
Tag.Description: Bearing to the destination point.\nThe range of values is from 0.00 to 359.99.

Tag.Title: Dest Dist Ref
Tag.Description: Specifies the unit used to express the distance to the destination point.\nK, M, and N represent kilometers, miles, and knots respectively.

Tag.Title: Dest Dist
Tag.Description: Distance to the destination point.

Tag.Title: Processing Method
Tag.Description: GPS Dest Processing Method

Tag.Title: Area Information
Tag.Description: GPS Area Information

Tag.Title: Date
Tag.Description: GPS Date

Tag.Title: Differential
Tag.Description: GPS Differential
